headline: Is It Time To Reconsider NextEra Energy (NEE) After Recent Utilities Sector Headlines?
summary: Wondering if NextEra Energy at around US$78.37 is offering real value today, or if the price already reflects the story you are buying into? The stock is up 14.4% over the past year. However, it shows a 2.4% decline over 7 days, a 2.7% decline over 30 days, and a 3.2% decline year to date, which can change how investors think about both upside and risk. Recent news around large US utilities like NextEra Energy has focused on sector wide questions such as how fast companies can grow clean...
